title: Ep. 62 - Why You Should Buy Gold Stocks Today
itunes:title: Why You Should Buy Gold Stocks Today
description: Legendary gold analyst John Doody says gold stocks are a buy on weakness.  He also gives his favorite gold picks. Frank breaks down Intel, Citigroup and Apple earnings.
